content: **crocheted top in drops cotton merino the piece is worked bottom up with fan-pattern and split in sides sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern cm-148 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m/l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops cotton merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 250-250-300-300-350 g colour 10 pistachio **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 mm **crochet gauge** 18 treble crochets in width and 9 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
